channel.title: 编程 on 冷宫
channel.description: Recent content in 编程 on 冷宫

item.title: 二分查找
item.description: 循环 function find2(data: number[], n) { let low = 0; let higth = data.length; let middleIndex = low + Math.floor((higth - low) / 2); let middleValue = data[middleIndex]; while (n !== middleValue) { if (higth <= low) { return -1; } if (n < middleValue) { higth = middleIndex; } else { low = middleIndex; } middleIndex = low + Math.floor((higth - low) / 2); middleValue = data[middleIndex]; } return middleIndex; } // test const array = [.
